column4: I am having problems connecting to ubuntu machine from XP macine with samba.  Attempt to map network drive on XP using \\192.168.0.104 (correct ip) says nothing found
anyone successfully set up samba so XP can map it as a network drive?
XP also has some probs on mapping as network drive (: so might not be 100% sambas fault
so you might wanna test if you can connect to any network drive with you'r xp installation
